title: Aeri Jeon
alternative_title: Aeri Jeon; The Story of Aeri; 어어리전; Aerie's Legend
status: Aeri Jeon; The Story of Aeri; 어어리전; Aerie's Legend
description:
Description :
        Aeri Jeon, Aerie's Legend, The Story of Aeri,, () at manhwawebsite**"If she is my wife, then I must gladly welcome her."**At the border of Hyeon-guk, where the enemy is close by."I requested that reinforcements be sent quicklywhat they sent with such care is a finely painted woman."The one who received the emperor's decree to welcome his wife without ceremony was Ha Mu-jin, the commander of the Hongla army and a king. This wedding, which stirred his anger, felt like a prank meant to give the emperor a sense of victory. Thus, even if they set up a bridal chamber in such a barren battlefield, it didn't matter who the bride was."I have received His Majesty's decree to, to marry the Grand Commander"Even if I stutter while saying it.Even if I stutter while saying it."So, you are saying that His Gracious Majesty the Emperor has bestowed upon Ha Mu-jin my wife. In that case, I shall gladly welcome her."However, even if it were just So-rang, she must cry to relieve his anger."Crying women are truly terrible, so you should cry with your whole body and take all my resentment."Maybe you like !
